name: Elemental Match-Up
description:
A game based on Rock-Paper-Scissors. Protect yourself from your enemy's elemental attacks by countering them with the correct elements!

There are five elements in the game: Fire, Water, Ice, Earth, and Nature; each having their own strengths and weaknesses.

HOW TO PLAY

  1. A sequence of elements will be displayed on the upper side of the screen. These are your enemy's elements.
  2. Create your sequence to counter the enemy's. Use the numbers 1 to 5 to place elements.
  3. Successfully countering an element will damage the enemy. Failing to do so damages you. In case of a draw, usually no one gets damaged.
  4. You win if the enemy's health reaches zero, you lose if yours do.

OTHER MECHANICS

  • The enemy may sometimes place Mirrors or Shadows in their sequence:
    • MIRRORS - Copies the last element you placed. They cannot change while and after matching an element against them.
    • SHADOWS - These are normal elements, but are shaded black. Their veil will be removed while and after matching an element against them.
  • EVENTS - They temporarily alter game mechanics.
  • ELEMENT SHUFFLING - Enabled only in Expert mode. This switches the elements in your hand, affecting the elements assigned to keys.

Developed for the Weekly Game Jam (Week 154)

Theme: "Rock Paper Scissors"
